com.xatkit.plugins.slack.platform.action

Class ReplyAttachmentsMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xatkit.core.platform.action.RuntimeAction<T>
      • com.xatkit.core.platform.action.RuntimeMessageAction<SlackPlatform>
        • com.xatkit.plugins.slack.platform.action.PostMessage
          • com.xatkit.plugins.slack.platform.action.PostAttachmentsMessage
            • com.xatkit.plugins.slack.platform.action.ReplyAttachmentsMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<RuntimeActionResult>

    public class ReplyAttachmentsMessage
extends PostAttachmentsMessage
    A RuntimeAction that replies to a message by uploading Attachment} using the input Slack channel.

    This action relies on the provided XatkitSession to retrieve the Slack channel associated to the user input.

    This class relies on the SlackPlatform's Slack client and Slack bot API token to connect to the Slack API and post the reply attachments.

    Note: this class requires that its containing SlackPlatform has been loaded with a valid Slack bot API token in order to authenticate the bot and post messages.

    See Also:
    PostMessage

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReplyAttachmentsMessage

        public ReplyAttachmentsMessage(SlackPlatform runtimePlatform,
                               XatkitSession session,
                               List<com.github.seratch.jslack.api.model.Attachment> attachments)
        Constructs a new ReplyAttachmentsMessage with the provided runtimePlatform, session, and attachments.
        Parameters:
        runtimePlatform - the SlackPlatform containing this action
        session - the XatkitSession associated to this action
        attachments - the Attachment list to post
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided runtimePlatform or session is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the text parameter of each entry of the provided attachments list is null or empty
        See Also:
        #getChannel(RuntimeContexts), PostMessage.PostMessage(SlackPlatform, XatkitSession, String, String)

      • ReplyAttachmentsMessage

        public ReplyAttachmentsMessage(SlackPlatform runtimePlatform,
                               XatkitSession session,
                               String pretext,
                               String title,
                               String text,
                               String attchColor,
                               String timestamp)
        Constructs a new ReplyAttachmentsMessage with the provided runtimePlatform, session, pretext, title, text, attchColor, and timestamp.
        Parameters:
        runtimePlatform - the SlackPlatform containing this action
        session - the XatkitSession associated to this action
        pretext - the pretext of the Attachment to post
        title - the title of the Attachment to post
        text - the text of the Attachment to post
        attchColor - the color of the Attachment to post in HEX format
        timestamp - the timestamp of the Attachment to post in epoch format
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided runtimePlatform or session is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the provided text list is null or empty
        See Also:
        #getChannel(RuntimeContexts), PostMessage.PostMessage(SlackPlatform, XatkitSession, String, String)

      • ReplyAttachmentsMessage

        public ReplyAttachmentsMessage(SlackPlatform runtimePlatform,
                               XatkitSession session,
                               String pretext,
                               String title,
                               String text,
                               String attchColor)
        Constructs a new ReplyAttachmentsMessage with the provided runtimePlatform, session, pretext, title, text, and attchColor.
        Parameters:
        runtimePlatform - the SlackPlatform containing this action
        session - the XatkitSession associated to this action
        pretext - the pretext of the Attachment to post
        title - the title of the Attachment to post
        text - the text of the Attachment to post
        attchColor - the color of the Attachment to post in HEX format
        timestamp - the timestamp of the Attachment to post will be set to the actual time
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided runtimePlatform or session is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the provided text list is null or empty
        See Also:
        #getChannel(RuntimeContexts), PostMessage.PostMessage(SlackPlatform, XatkitSession, String, String)
